summary: A pretty nord follower with elf ears. She uses conjuration and can be married.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=5][center]YURIA-THE NORDIC ELF CONJURER[/center][/size][/font][size=4][center]
Description[/center][/size][font=Tahoma]Name: Yuria
[/font]Class: Mage, Conjurer
Race: Nord (With elf ears)
Hair color: Auburn
Starter armor: Apprentice Robes of Conjuration
Marriageable: Yes

Yuria is my first mod/follower that I've ever made, so I thought I'd upload it for people to use. She specializes in conjuration and starts out with a couple of staffs for you and her to use/sell, as well as some food that you can eat if you need.Â 

Install her using NMM. To find her, you need to use [url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/?]AreYouThere by bein[/url] and use the SkyUI MCM to open the AreYouThere menu. Click on init and then wait until more menu sections show up under that MCM. You need to activate her under the actors menu(just find Thundias_Reya.esp and click on it) and then go into the cloning menu and just click on Yuria. It should spawn her next to you.

[size=4][center]Permissions[/center][/size]You can use Yuria for anything and if you use her in any of your mods just make sure to credit me.
[center][/center][size=4][center]Credits[/center][/size][center][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion by HHaley[/url][/center][center][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania by tetrodoxin[/url][/center][center][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE by Diethardt[/url][/center][center][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty by LogRaam[/url][/center][center][/center][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?][center]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition by Caliente[/center][/url][center][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81561/?]Make A Follower Workshop 2017 by Ashes2Asherz[/url][/center][center][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/?]Emfy Cleric Robes UNP - CBBE by Deserter X - Mitosuke[/url][/center]
author: Thundias
